Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 138th overall pick, by Texas in 1972...
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1973...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/1982, off Rich Gossage (NYM)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Atlanta on 6/4/1982...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1982, hitting .284 with 33 HR, 101 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Los Angeles on 6/8/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1983, hitting .538 with 1 HR, 13 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against St. Louis on 6/29/1983...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1983, hitting .396 with 5 HR, 34 RBI...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1983, hitting .577 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1983, hitting .451 with 9 HR, 21 RBI...
Won MVP Award in 1983, hitting .321 with 30 HR, 110 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1984, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Cincinnati on 7/24/1984...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Chicago (N) on 9/2/1984...
Won MVP Award in 1984, hitting .341 with 31 HR, 128 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1985, hitting .478 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1985, hitting .358 with 7 HR, 29 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1986, hitting .545 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 8/3/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1987, hitting .435 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against St. Louis on 10/3/1987...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1988, hitting .385 with 5 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against St. Louis on 8/19/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1988, hitting .435 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1988, hitting .354 with 7 HR, 28 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Texas on 7/7/1989 (Going to PIT: RF G. Hill, RF A. Dawson. Going to TEX: 1B E. Murray)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1989, hitting .360 with 4 HR, 19 RBI...
Won World Series with Texas in 1989...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Boston on 4/2/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1991, hitting .529 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/1/1993 to a 1-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
